name: UpEquity
headline: UpEquity gives homebuyers more certainty and power.
description: UpEquity is removing contingencies for home buyers so that they have more negotiating leverage when purchasing their next home.

founders.name: Timothy Herman, Founder
founders.description: Before founding UpEquity I was a fighter pilot in the US Navy. I flew F/A-18s off aircraft carriers and was one of the first F-35C pilots in the Navy. After leaving the Navy, I attended Harvard Business School where I was a candidate for an MBA. Half way through my tenure at HBS, I participated in the S19 batch and dropped out of school.

#  Buy your next home before|
##  We're UpEquity 
Since its founding in 2019, UpEquity has been building a better way to buy a home. We are a veteran-owned, real estate company on a mission to create more equal access to the American Dream. 
Our flagship solution, the UpEquity Trade Up program, helps homeowners who are buying and selling at the same time. We specialize in unlocking equity and removing contingencies so that you can make a competitive, winning offer on your next home. 
[ Buy before you sell ](http://www.upequity.com/<https:/www.upequity.com/homeowner?hsLang=en>)
![couplecirclekeysgrade-01](https://www.upequity.com/hubfs/Other%20Assets/couplecirclekeysgrade-01.png)

generated_description:
### UpEquity: Empowering Homebuyers Since 2019

**Mission:** UpEquity aims to empower homebuyers by providing them with greater certainty and negotiating power in the real estate market.

#### Background

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator Batch S19, UpEquity is based in Austin, Texas, and boasts a team of 90 dedicated employees. The company was created by veterans with a vision to democratize access to the American Dream of homeownership. 

#### What They Do

UpEquity specializes in removing contingencies in real estate transactions. This approach gives homebuyers much-needed leverage when making offers, particularly in competitive markets. Their flagship offering, the **UpEquity Trade Up program**, supports homeowners who are trying to buy and sell simultaneously, unlocking equity to facilitate smoother transitions.

#### Key Features

- **Buy Before You Sell:** A unique program that enables homeowners to make winning offers on their next home by effectively using their existing equity.
- **Agent Resources:** UpEquity equips real estate agents with tools and support to assist clients better.
  
#### Company Culture and Values

As a veteran-founded company, UpEquity embraces values such as service, integrity, and equality. This ethos reflects in their commitment to providing accessible options for homebuyers and offering personalized service to navigate the complexities of real estate. 

#### Contact Information

- **Website:** [www.upequity.com](http://www.upequity.com)
- **Address:** 1145 W. 5th St., Austin, TX 78703
- **Phone:** (512) 580-7600

### Conclusion

In a landscape where home buying can feel daunting, UpEquity stands out by giving buyers the tools they need to confidently navigate the market. Their approach of eliminating contingencies not only levels the playing field but also embodies a modern perspective on homeownership. If you’re interested in exploring your options, UpEquity is ready to help you turn real estate dreams into reality.
